name: Gore chore
description:
Gore Chore 

Sacrifices must be made to free the Dark Lord! Take control over a demon and his servant and help them to fulfill their quest of mass destruction.

Feed the demon by sacrificing animals with the priest. Powered with blood he will guard of the revengeful spirits that attack the priest from the shadow realm. Can you take control of two evil beings in two different realms, at the same time? And even more important – Can you collect enough blood to open the gates of HELL?

Controls

Press WASD to move the priest. Press SPACE to pick up friendy animals, or kill enemy priests. Use your Cursor to move the Demon. Press the left mouse Button to attack. When you find a rare animal you gain a special attack that you can use with the right mouse button. ESC opens the menu to change graphics/sound settings.

Ludum Dare

This game was made for the Ludum Dare 43. Please keep in mind that there is a lot in this game that still needs to be fixed in the future.
